name: Labrador mutt
description: This once-average Labrador mixed breed dog has clearly gone feral.  Though it likely still instinctually trusts humans, it's probably far from domestic by now.
//: 1-4 puppies & 270 days per-litter for size small canines

name: armored labrador
description: A shaggy Labrador Retriever fitted with a protective Kevlar harness.  Moderate bashing and cutting protection, reduced agility and speed.

name: attack labrador
description: A shaggy Labrador Retriever that has been trained to fight.  Improved agility, attack, health, owner bond, and speed.

name: armored attack labrador
description: A shaggy Labrador Retriever fitted with a protective Kevlar harness and trained to fight.  Moderate bashing and cutting protection.  Improved attack, health, and owner bond.

name: bulldog
description: The American Bulldog is a hardy, well built dog, that seems suited for surviving the apocalypse.  Can be trained as an attack dog.
//: 7 puppies and 300-320 days per-litter for size medium canines

name: armored bulldog
description: A muscular American Bulldog fitted with a protective Kevlar harness.  Moderate bashing and cutting protection, reduced agility and speed.  Can be trained as an attack dog.

name: attack bulldog
description: A muscular American Bulldog that has been trained to fight.  Improved agility, attack, health, owner bond, and speed.

name: armored attack bulldog
description: A muscular American Bulldog fitted with a protective Kevlar harness and trained to fight.  Moderate bashing and cutting protection.  Improved attack, health, and owner bond.

name: pit bull mix
description: The oft-misunderstood Pit Bull is not actually a single breed but a label for several such as American Pit Bull Terrier and American Staffordshire Terrier.  Average abilities and well-known for their 'lock jaw' which isn't real but their incredible determination is.  Can be trained as an attack dog.
//: 1-4 puppies & 270 days per-litter for size small canines

name: armored pit bull mix
description: A ferocious Pit Bull mix fitted with a protective Kevlar harness.  Moderate bashing and cutting protection, reduced agility and speed.  Can be trained as an attack dog.

name: attack pit bull mix
description: A ferocious Pit Bull mix that has been trained to fight.  Improved agility, attack, health, owner bond, and speed.

name: armored attack pit bull mix
description: A ferocious Pit Bull mix fitted with a protective Kevlar harness and trained to fight.  Moderate bashing and cutting protection.  Improved attack, health, and owner bond.

name: beagle
description: An adorable Beagle that has managed to survive the apocalypse.  Being agile and small, they are difficult to shoot at.  Generally attacks in packs.
//: 1-4 puppies & 270 days per-litter for size tiny canines

name: armored beagle
description: A regal Beagle fitted with a protective Kevlar harness.  Moderate bashing and cutting protection, reduced agility and speed.

name: attack beagle
description: A regal Beagle that has been trained to fight.  Improved agility, attack, health, owner bond, and speed.

name: armored attack beagle
description: A regal Beagle fitted with a protective Kevlar harness and trained to fight.  Moderate bashing and cutting protection.  Improved attack, health, and owner bond.

name: border collie
description: An athletic and hyperactive dog that loves to herd animals and jump, the Border Collie is an agile attacker.  Although they can be easy to train, they don't work well in packs.  Can be trained as an attack dog.
//: 1-4 puppies & 270 days per-litter for size small canines

name: armored border collie
description: A hyper Border Collie fitted with a protective Kevlar harness.  Moderate bashing and cutting protection, reduced agility and speed.  Can be trained as an attack dog.

name: attack border collie
description: A hyper Border Collie that has been trained to fight.  Improved agility, attack, health, owner bond, and speed.

name: armored attack border collie
description: A hyper Border Collie fitted with a protective Kevlar harness and trained to fight.  Moderate bashing and cutting protection.  Improved attack, health, and owner bond.

name: boxer mastiff
description: An ordinary breed full of affection, the Boxer Mastiff doesn't stand out amongst other dogs but has mediocre abilities nonetheless.  Can be trained as an attack dog.
//: 1-4 puppies & 270 days per-litter for size small canines

name: armored boxer mastiff
description: A stocky Boxer Mastiff fitted with a protective Kevlar harness.  Moderate bashing and cutting protection, reduced agility and speed.  Can be trained as an attack dog.

name: attack boxer mastiff
description: A stocky Boxer Mastiff that has been trained to fight.  Improved agility, attack, health, owner bond, and speed.

name: armored attack boxer mastiff
description: A stocky Boxer Mastiff fitted with a protective Kevlar harness and trained to fight.  Moderate bashing and cutting protection.  Improved attack, health, and owner bond.

name: chihuahua
description: It's a tiny Chihuahua.  How it has managed to survive is a miracle; although its small size and aggressive nature may been useful.
//: 1-3 puppies & 240 days per-litter for size tiny canines

name: armored chihuahua
description: A skittish Chihuahua that is more Kevlar harness than dog.  Moderate bashing and cutting protection, drastically reduced agility and speed.

name: attack chihuahua
description: A skittish Chihuahua that has been trained to embrace its bark rather than its bite.  Improved agility, attack, health, owner bond, and speed.

name: armored attack chihuahua
description: A skittish Chihuahua fitted with a protective Kevlar harness and trained to fight.  Moderate bashing and cutting protection.  Improved attack, health, and owner bond.  Why would you do this?

name: dachshund
description: A weiner dog!  This awkward looking dog can be a useful watch dog, plus it looks adorable as it bumbles around, also making it hard to shoot.
//: 1-4 puppies & 270 days per-litter for size small canines

name: armored dachshund
description: A long-bodied Dachshund awkwardly maneuvering within a fitted protective Kevlar harness.  Moderate bashing and cutting protection, reduced agility and speed.

name: attack dachshund
description: A long-bodied Dachshund that has been trained to fight, or so it wants you to believe.  Improved agility, attack, health, owner bond, and speed.

name: armored attack dachshund
description: A long-bodied Dachshund fitted with a protective Kevlar harness and trained to fight.  Moderate bashing and cutting protection.  Improved attack, health, and owner bond.  This seems cruel.

name: german shepherd
description: The original K-9 breed.  An easy to train and great attack dog that will also defend its owner to the death, however they don't work well in packs.  Can be trained as an attack dog.
//: 1-7 puppies & 300-320 days per-litter for size medium canines

name: armored german shepherd
description: A noble German Shepherd fitted with a protective Kevlar harness.  Moderate bashing and cutting protection, reduced agility and speed.  Can be trained as an attack dog.

name: attack german shepherd
description: A noble German Shepherd that has been trained to fight and not flee.  Improved agility, attack, health, owner bond, and speed.

name: armored attack german shepherd
description: A noble German Shepherd fitted with a protective Kevlar harness and trained to fight.  Moderate bashing and cutting protection.  Improved attack, health, and owner bond.
